plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange sometimes, but also can be green!
🐰 Rabbits like to munch on me.
🌱 I grow underground.

additionalData.funFact: Grass is one of the most important plants on Earth, providing food and shelter for many animals!

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and smell very sweet. Bees love me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You might give me to someone you love.
🐝 I make yummy food for bees.
🌈 I come in many different colors.

additionalData.funFact: Flowers help make fruits and seeds!

plant.question: I am big and tall, with a brown trunk and green leaves. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb on me

additionalData.funFact: Trees give us the air we breathe!

plant.question: I am long, green, and grow on a vine. I am a yummy veggie to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 You can make pickles out of me!
🥗 I am often found in salads.
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow.

plant.question: I have a hard shell, and you can drink my juice. Monkeys love to eat me, what am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a tall tree by the beach.
🥥 I have sweet water inside.
🐒 Monkeys like to eat my flesh

plant.question: I am round and red, and grow on a plant in the garden. You use me to make sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often in pasta sauce.
☀️ I love the sun and warm weather.
🪴 You need to give me support as I grow!

plant.question: I am a tall plant with yellow kernels, and you can eat me off the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am often grown in fields.
🍿 You can pop me into a yummy snack.
🌾 My leaves wrap around my kernels

additionalData.funFact: Corn is used to make many things, including fuel!

plant.question: I am a seed that you roast, grind and make a delicious drink out of. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ I give grown ups energy in the morning.
🌍 I am grown in many different countries.
🍫 Some people mix me with chocolate

additionalData.funFact: Coffee is one of the most traded commodities in the world!

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp needles instead of leaves, and I stay green all year long. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 You decorate me for Christmas.
🐻 Animals like to live under me.
🪵 I smell very nice when you chop me up!

additionalData.funFact: Pine trees help clean the air!

plant.question: I am a plant that climbs and wraps around other things. I have beautiful purple flowers and sometimes make yummy grapes. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I produce fruit that is made into juice.
🧱 I need something strong to hold on to.
🦋 I provide support for butterfly chrysalises!

additionalData.funFact: Some vines can grow to be hundreds of years old!

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. You ride me to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am big and yellow (sometimes!)
👧👦 Many kids ride me together
🛑 I stop to pick up children

transport.question: I float on the water and help people travel across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a canoe
🚢 I can carry lots of people and things
⚓ I need a place to dock when I stop

transport.question: I go super fast in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly above the clouds
💺 You sit in a seat to ride me.
✈️ I have wings.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me in the park
🔔 I might have a bell to ring.
🚴 You need to balance to ride me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many people across cities or countries. What am I?

hints.text: 🚝 I am longer than a bus.
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.
🛤️ I follow a special path made of metal.

transport.question: I help people move when they have broken legs. I do not need an engine. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍⚕️ You can find me at the hospital.
🤸 You use your arms to move.
🤕 I help people with injuries

transport.question: I fly but I am not an airplane, I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air
🚨 I am used for rescue missions.
🏥 I can land on a building rooftop

transport.question: I am a car that is used when someone is not well and needs to get to the hospital quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a siren that goes 'wee-ooh, wee-ooh'.
🤕 I carry doctors and nurses to sick people.
🚦 I can jump red lights with permission

transport.question: I am a vehicle that farmers use to work in the field. I am strong and I can pull heavy things. What am I?

hints.text: 🚜 I have big wheels
🌾 I help to plant and harvest crops.
👩‍🌾 Farmers drive me.

transport.question: I travel in space, far away from Earth, and help people explore the stars. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🌌 I can fly to the moon.
